title: Exclusive Five-Star Oberoi India Tour
description: Tour India's Golden Triangle in royal maharajah-style for ten days, visiting Delhi, Agra, Jaipur and Gurgaon and their iconic landmarks while staying in the world's most opulent hotels - The Oberoi Hotels. This ten-day luxury private tour of India includes daily breakfast, daily yoga classes, 25% discount on spa treatments at the hotels, personalised butler service, private transfers with a chauffeur (at your disposal from day three of the tour until the penultimate day of the tour), return airport transfers and much more.
offer_address: Dr. Zakir Hussain Marg, Delhi Golf Club, Golf Links, New Delhi, Delhi

title: The World's Most Luxurious India Tour: 9-Night The Oberoi Opulence within the Golden Triangle
description:
Experience India’s most sought-after destinations and embrace royal maharajah majesty, staying in utmost luxury across a dazzling suite of five-star stays with the iconic Oberoi Hotels & Resorts. Featured in the prestigious Condé Nast Traveler's Gold List 2023, experience the best of one of the finest hotel chains in the world, travelling in self-guided luxury from the sprawling city of New Delhi to the former heart of the Moghul Empire, Agra, and onwards to colourful Jaipur. With daily dining, nightly drinks, private airport pick-up and a private chauffeur-driven car at your disposal throughout your journey, this is the odyssey of a lifetime.

Lavishly furnished and lovingly steeped in rich and royal Indian heritage, each Oberoi hotel is a sumptuous delight. Savour moments spent shopping or dining in The Oberoi New Delhi's luxury retail arcade, become spellbound by spectacular views spanning millennia of history at The Oberoi Agra or lose yourself among the flawless gardens and flaming toches at The Oberoi Rajvilas Jaipur.
offer_address: Dr Zakir Hussain Marg, Delhi Golf Club, Golf Links, New Delhi, Delhi 110003, India

This six-day luxury private tour of India includes daily breakfast, daily yoga classes, 25% discount on spa treatments at the hotels, butler service on call, return airport transfers and much more.

title: The Golden Triangle: Discover New Delhi, Agra and Jaipur in Award-Winning Oberoi Opulence
description:
Experience India’s most sought-after destinations in royal maharajah-style, staying in the world’s most opulent hotels, The Oberoi Group. Ranked #2 in the Top 25 Hotel Brands in the World for 2019 by Travel + Leisure magazine, Oberoi will entice you with daily buffet breakfast, daily three-course dinner, one daily drink per person, daily yoga sessions, a chef-led cooking class, a personal butler throughout your stays, 25% off spa treatments, return airport transfers and a private chauffeur-driven car at your disposal to take you from the sprawling capital of Delhi to the former heart of the Moghul Empire, Agra, and onwards to Jaipur, home to some of Asia’s best bazaars.

**Upgrade** to experience the beauty of Udaipur, famous for its spectacular City Palace and serene Lake Pichola.
offer_address: Dr Zakir Hussain Marg, Delhi Golf Club, Golf Links, New Delhi, Delhi 110003, India

title: Renowned Pullman Luxury Near New Delhi’s Business Hubs with Daily Breakfast
description: Explore New Delhi from a glamorous launchpad, Pullman New Delhi Aerocity Hotel, ideally located near the business hubs of Gurgaon and Cyber City, as well as shopping malls, restaurants and bars. Whether you are on a business trip or a leisurely escape with friends and family, experience the Pullman brand's renowned luxury as you enjoy daily buffet breakfast, one buffet dinner, a cocktail per person each night, a 45-minute massage once during your stay and complimentary Wi-Fi.
offer_address: 2 IGI Airport GMR Hospitality District Asset No 02, New Delhi, Delhi 110037, India

title: Heritage Stay in the Heart of New Delhi
description: Discover the colourful markets, ancient monuments, grand palaces and bustling street food stalls of India's most vibrant city with a two-night escape at the luxurious The Imperial New Delhi. Take advantage of the prime location to explore the city, while enjoying daily buffet breakfast, a daily yoga session, a 60-minute hydrotherapy session for two, a delicious welcome amenity platter on arrival with fruit bowl, a refreshing mocktail while touring the heritage art of the hotel, and a guaranteed early check in and late check out.
offer_address: Janpath Ln, Janpath, Connaught Place, New Delhi, Delhi 110001, India

title: Discover the Magic of India's Golden Triangle
description: Experience the must-see sights of India with a once-in-a-lifetime, seven-day private Golden Triangle Tour to New Delhi, Agra and Jaipur. Stay in luxury four and five-star accommodation, with daily breakfast, a private, air-conditioned car with driver providing transfers between all sightseeing, plus Delhi airport/train station pick-up and drop-off.
offer_address: Crowne Plaza, Twin District Centre, Sector 10, Rohini, New Delhi, Delhi 110085, India

title: Elegant New Delhi Palatial Stay with Onsite Restaurants, Rooftop Bar & Pool
description: Sink into the epitome of luxury and elegance at this a five-star retreat, set in the heart of India's bustling capital, New Delhi. This hotel boasts a rich history, having played host to royalty and celebrities alike. Savour the finest Indian cuisine at the acclaimed Dhilli restaurant, or explore international flavours at the rooftop Cirrus9 bar. Venture out to explore the city's cultural treasures, including the majestic India Gate, Humayan's Tomb and the historic Red Fort, all within easy reach.
offer_address: Dr Zakir Hussain Marg, New Delhi 110003, India

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express New Delhi Intl Airport T3
title: India Airport Stay within Walking Distance to Arrival & Departure Lounges
description: Relax, rejuvenate, and freshen up after a long flight at Holiday Inn Express New Delhi Int'l Airport T3, an IHG Hotel. Make your travels more enjoyable by retreating from the hustle and bustle with a sojourn in this conveniently located hotel, accessible from both domestic and international terminals. Enjoy a hot shower, keep up on your exercise routine in the fitness centre, and grab a scrumptious bite or cocktail in the Great Room before continuing along your journey.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express New Delhi Int'l Airport T3, an IHG Hotel

title: Heritage Stay in the Heart of Vibrant New Delhi
description:
Discover the colourful markets, ancient monuments, iconic government institutions, and bustling street food stalls of India's vibrant capital with a remarkable stay at The Imperial New Dheli, perfectly located in the heart of Delhi. Constructed in 1931, The Imperial New Delhi exudes colonial-era luxury, and the perfectly polished marble floors, vintage rattan furniture, antique statues, elegant artworks and high ceilings are sure to draw you in. 

This sophisticated refuge also boasts a long list of stunning facilities, including four restaurants, two bars, an award-winning spa, a mesmerising swimming pool (seasonal), and a squash court. When you’re ready to step outside the walls of this palatial property, the best of Delhi is right outside your doorstep, with plenty of must-see spots within close reach. Make your way to Rashtrapati Bhavan, pay a visit to the buzzing lanes of 17th-century Old Delhi, or weave your way through the bustling Connaught Place. Or skip it all and just embrace the lavish comforts of The Imperial New Delhi
offer_address: Janpath Ln, Janpath, Connaught Place, New Delhi, Delhi 110001, India

title: Shangri-La Eros, New Delhi - LPP
offer_address: 19 Ashoka Rd, Janpath, Connaught Place, New Delhi, Delhi 110001, India

vendor_name: Crowne Plaza New Delhi Mayur Vihar Noida
title: Sophisticated City Escape near New Delhi's Noida District with Rooftop Pool
description: Between New Delhi’s vivid historic districts and Noida’s storied temples sits Crowne Plaza New Delhi Mayur Vihar Noida. This ideally located, sophisticated modern jewel offers the perfect gateway to one of the region’s most exciting business and culture districts, located just 20 minutes away, while offering access to top-notch facilities and services. Enjoy use of the mirage-like rooftop swimming pool and round-the-clock access to the business centre, drop into the onsite restaurant Infinity, which proudly serves sumptuous Italian plates daily, or embark on a voyage of relaxation at Hibiscus Spa. Leave it all behind to explore the region’s countless hidden gems, including Connaught Place or Noida Sector 18 for a shopping fix, or Akshardham Temple or Humayun's Tomb to step back in time.
location_description: Crowne Plaza New Delhi Mayur Vihar Noida, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: District Centre, Crowne Plaza Parking & Banquet Hall, Mayur Place, Mayur Vihar, New Delhi, Delhi 110091, India

vendor_name: Holiday Inn New Delhi Mayur Vihar Noida
title: Delhi Centrally Located Modern Escape with Infinity Pool
description: Discover the vibrant heart of Delhi when you stay at Holiday Inn New Delhi Mayur Vihar Noida, an IHG Hotel. Major sites are within easy reach: visit the Red Fort, Humayun's Tomb and Mehrauli Archaeological Park all in a single afternoon. When you're not experiencing the whirlwind of this loud and proud city, stay in and enjoy a swim in your hotel's refreshing infinity pool, dive into authentic Indian cusine on the terrace at Cafe On 3, and work up a sweat at the modern fitness centre.
location_description: Holiday Inn New Delhi Mayur Vihar Noida, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 13A Mayur Place, Mayur Vihar, New Delhi, 110091 India

vendor_name: Holiday Inn New Delhi International Airport
title: New Delhi Airport Escape with Four Restaurants & Swimming Pool
description: It's all too easy to explore the wonders of New Delhi when you stay at Holiday Inn New Delhi International Airport, an IHG Hotel, a modern escape just a stone's throw from the airport. In between your explorations, take a break from the heat with a dip in the outdoor swimming pool or treat yourself to a manicure or spa treatment at Lea Spa & Salon. There are four dining venues onsite - feast on everything from burgers to pastries to mouthwatering, authentic Indian curries.
location_description: Holiday Inn New Delhi International Airport, an IHG Hotel

title: Modern Five-Star New Delhi Stay with Palm-Fringed Outdoor Pool
description: Experience the best of India's capital at the five-star Crowne Plaza New Delhi Rohini, a purpose-built hotel for functions, weddings and events. Sleek facilities include a huge outdoor swimming pool, an fitness centre overlooking the manicured hotel grounds, and a myriad of ballrooms to suit any occasion. Fulfil any craving with Asian and international cuisine at the buffet-style Mosaic restaurant and find your favourite local dishes at the hotel's signature Spice Art Restaurant.
location_description: Crowne Plaza New Delhi Rohini, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Twin District Centre Sector 10, Rohini, New Delhi, Delhi 110085, India

title: Sophisticated New Delhi City Break with Rooftop Pool
description: In the heart of New Delhi’s exciting Okhla district, Crowne Plaza New Delhi Okhla, an IHG Hotel, offers guests the perfect base to explore the storied city’s many charms, including Red Fort, Humayun’s Tomb and the Okhla Bird Sanctuary. After days spent appreciating New Delhi’s sublime history and great bazaars, savour dim sum and doppio ripieno ravioli at ChaoBella or classic patisserie at French Heart, or  laze by the hotel’s mirage-like rooftop pool.
location_description: Crowne Plaza New Delhi Okhla, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Plot No. 1 Community Centre, Okhla I, New Delhi 110020, India
